ModMetaData.name: Genetic Heads Framework for [NL] Facial Animation
ModMetaData.author: SunshineyDays

descriptionsByVersion.v1.5:
Core framework for assigning [NL] Facial Animation WIP based on Biotech-type genes. Intended as a dependency for head packs. Supports multi-gene logic, modular head packs, and fallback handling.
- Dynamically maps to specific gene combinations using mod extensions - Automatically selects the most specific match for a pawn's gene set, or falls back to race/gender-appropriate ones if none match - Adds variety by randomly selecting one of several head types when a gene rule offers multiple choices
descriptionsByVersion.v1.6:
Adds a slightly different logic than [NL] Facial Animation WIP when it comes to gene part selection. Uses the FA field targetGeneDefs and adds more restrictions so heads are assigned appropriately.
With the new gene-specific FA head sorting limiting choices in the FA part selector, instead use Character Editor to apply any head to your pawns.
